definition: opal (abbr. for 澳洲寶石|澳洲宝石)
abbr. for Macao 澳門|澳门/abbr. for Australia 澳大利亞|澳大利亚

sentences.english: At Hills Kindy we continuously ensure that the safety of the children comes first.
sentences.chinese: 在澳寶，我們永遠確保兒童的安全第一。

sentences.english: The Australian Opal and Diamond Collection is one of Australia's leading Opal merchants.
sentences.chinese: 在澳大利亞澳寶經銷商中一直居於領先地位。
